errorPage.title: An unexpected error occured
errorPage.message: Something went wrong. Refreshing the page might help.

404Page.pageNotFoundContent: Oh no, something went wrong. Try to enter the application <lnk>here</lnk>, through the front page

loginPage.errorLabel: An unexpected error occurred. Please, sign in again.
loginPage.sessionExpiredLabel: User session expired. Sign in again
loginPage.infoLabel: Using the service requires strong authentication
loginPage.logoutInfoContent: You have been logged out. If you want to continue to use the service, you have to log in again click the button here below.
loginPage.infoContent: You should identify yourself to be able to advance to the service. You can choose yourself which identification method you want to use. Click on the bottom below to identify yourself.

thankyouPage.thankyouMessageContent: Please wait for your application to be handled. We will be in touch with you once the handling process is finished, and you will then be permited the billing license. You may now close this page.
thankyouPage.title: Application {{submitted_at}}

step1.name: Employer
step1.tooltip: Write your information in the form. Click Save and continue to move forward. You can return to the data also at the next stage.

step2.name: Employment
step2.tooltip: Write in the form the information of the summer worker and the serial number of the Summer Job Voucher. You can return to the data also at the next stage.
step2.employment_description_placeholder: Describe the the work tasks of the employee.

step3.name: Send
step3.employmentTitle: Description of the young person’s employment
step3.tooltip: Here you can see your information and attachments. Check that, all information is accurate and press “send the application”. If you want to correct something, press “return back”.

inputs.is_separate_invoicer: The billing is handled by an other person
inputs.invoicer_name: Name of the billing contact person
inputs.invoicer_email: Email of the billing contact person
inputs.invoicer_phone_number: Phone number of the billing contact person
inputs.summer_voucher_serial_number: Serial number of the Summer Job Voucher
inputs.hired_without_voucher_assessment: Would you have employed without the Summer Job Voucher?
inputs.termsAndConditions: I have read and accept the terms of use.

helpers.attachments: You may add a maximum of 5 attachments. The approved file forms are: pdf, jpg, png. The maximum size 10MB.
helpers.employment_contract: Attach here the employment contract of the youth employed with the Summer Job Voucher.
helpers.payslip: Attach here the pay statement of the youth employed with the Summer Job Voucher.

errors.required: Information is missing or is incorrect
errors.maxLength: The information you entered is too long
errors.pattern: The information you entered is in an incorrect format
errors.validate: The information you entered is in an incorrect format

notification.title: Fill in the missing or incorrect information

attachments.title: An error occured while uploading the file.
attachments.fileType: The file type is not allowed.

upload.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

delete.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
